DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Participant Assignment Begin Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date an individual enrolled in a research study is assigned a specific therapy plan based on study design and eligibility criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Participant Assignment Begin Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research.:Someone who takes part in an activity.:An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use; or for a particular time or object._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research.:Someone who takes part in an activity.:An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use; or for a particular time or object.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
Someone who takes part in an activity.
An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

Property.preferredDefinition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/6/10 Unretired DEC as it is used by CDE 2842725.   7/21/10 Retired as part of PSC Model cleanup.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Duke University adoption of C3D
